# NSLayoutConstraint.Axis.horizontal

**Case**

The constraint applied when laying out the horizontal relationship between objects.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Constants

- **NSLayoutConstraint.Axis.vertical**: The constraint applied when laying out the vertical relationship between objects.
